page.title: 13POLITICS
page.content: The town has been{"Twinned"}with {Pleyber-Christ, Brittany}since the late 1970's and pupils at{Lostwithiel {Junior and Infant School}have been making "Exchange visits" with pupils from the{R.C. School, St.Pierre}since 1982 when in June a class visits {Pleyber-Christ}for a week and the {Bretons}make a return visit in the last week in July. Other groups in the town have made exchange visits. A number of people have made firm personal contact with people in {Pleyber-Christ}and {La Palais,}the centre of a one time farm is a main point of contact.
